database.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.amun_service_forum}` ( `id` INT(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `globalId` VARCHAR(36) NOT NULL, `pageId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `userId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `sticky` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `closed` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `urlTitle` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, `title` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, `text` LONGTEXT NOT NULL, `date` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `globalId` (`globalId`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
